Class OrderFarrell

java.lang.Object
OrderFarrell
public class OrderFarrell extends Object
Class OrderFarrell contains the order list and methods to manipulate the contents of that order

      public boolean addToOrder(MenuItemFarrell menuItem)
      addToOrder Method accepts a menu item parameter, then checks if the order has space, adding it to the order if there is space
      Parameters:
      menuItem - MenuItemFarrell Object created by the user to be added to the order
      Returns:
      success Boolean representing the success or failure of the attempt to add the MenuItem to the order

      public double calcTotal()
      calcTotal Method accepts no parameters and sifts through the list, tallies up the total price the order will cost
      Returns:
      totalCost value of all Object's price * quantity in the order
